name: deep_lab.escape
description:
This game was made for The Compo of Ludum Dare 51, check out the submission page!

Check out the Source Code on Github!

In deep_lab.escape, you've been trapped in this lab for a very long time. How long have you been kept here? Why? All you know is that the security cameras only turn on every ten seconds. 

All assets by me*

*Font: Classified by Chevy Ray
